data.title: Interview with Philippa Gregory on Maria Beatrice D'Este
data.meta_description: We got the chance to talk to bestselling author, Philippa Gregory, about one of the characters of her new book, Dawnlands,Maria Beatrice D'Este, a real historical f
data.text:
We got the chance to talk to bestselling author, Philippa Gregory, about one of the characters of her new book, Dawnlands,Maria Beatrice D'Este, a real historical figure as well as a character, daughter of Duke Alfonso IV of Modena and Reggio Emilia and Queen of England, married to King James II.

Philippa has written many historical novels whch include "The other Boleyn girl" and "The White Queen"

If youre enjoying A History of Italy Podcast, please consider rating and reviewing my show! This helps me continue to make more episodes that bring the fascinating history of Italy to you. Be sure to let me know what you loved most about this episode!

Also, if you havent done so already, follow the podcast. Im adding a bunch of bonus episodes to the feed and, if youre not following, theres a good chance youll miss out. Click the Blue Follow Now button at the top of the page!
